page.title: 07SERVICES IN WEST PENNARD
page.content: For people in West Pennard, Glastonbury (4km away) provides many essential services. It is necessary to go to Glastonbury for the doctor, dentist, policeman and fireman. Many in the village must travel to towns in the area for employment since there are few jobs in the village. The only shop in the village is the small Post Office which stocks a wide selection of essential goods. The petrol stations also sell a few items. The Post Office is a sorting office for the 150-200 houses in the village and it has its own postman. Until 1972 West Pennard had a policeman who also served Butleigh and Baltonsborough. The police station has been converted into a house. West Pennard has its own resevoir on the hill. It has mains electricity, water and sewerage but no piped gas.
